hints.title: Exponential KL-Convergence via Mean-Field Generator Analysis
hints.content:
4275: :label: thm-meanfield-lsi-standalone
4276: 
4277: **Hypotheses**:
4278: 
4279: 1. **Log-concavity (Axiom 3.5)**: The quasi-stationary distribution has density $\rho_\pi(z) = \exp(-V_{\text{QSD}}(z))$ for convex $V_{\text{QSD}}$
4280: 
4281: 2. **Fitness-QSD anti-correlation**: There exists $\lambda_{\text{corr}} > 0$ such that:
4282:    $$\log V[z] = -\lambda_{\text{corr}} V_{\text{QSD}}(z) + \log V_0$$
4283: 
4284: 3. **Regularity**: All distributions have smooth densities in $C^2(\Omega)$ with:
4285:    - $0 < \rho_{\min} \leq \rho(z) \leq \rho_{\max} < \infty$
4286:    - $0 < V_{\min} \leq V[z] \leq V_{\max} < \infty$
4287: 
4288: 4. **Noise regime**: Cloning noise variance satisfies $\delta^2 > \delta_{\min}^2$
4289: 
4290: 5. **Parameter conditions**: Friction $\gamma > 0$, confining potential convexity $\kappa_{\text{conf}} > 0$, time step $\tau$ sufficiently small
4291: 
4292: **Conclusion**:
4293: 
4294: The discrete-time Markov chain $S_{t+1} = \Psi_{\text{total}}(S_t)$ with:
4295: $$
4296: \Psi_{\text{total}} := \Psi_{\text{clone}} \circ \Psi_{\text{kin}}
4297: $$
4298: 
4299: satisfies exponential convergence in KL divergence:
4300: 
4301: $$
4302: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi_{\text{QSD}}) \leq e^{-\lambda t} D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_0 \| \pi_{\text{QSD}}) + C_\infty
4303: $$
4304: 
4305: where:
4306: $$
4307: \lambda = \tau(\alpha_{\text{kin}} + \beta_{\text{clone}}) = \tau \cdot O(\gamma \kappa_{\text{conf}} + \lambda_{\text{clone}} \lambda_{\text{corr}})
4308: $$
4309:

4297: $$

4300: 
4301: $$
